flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: I learned this one the hard way. As I bet most people who undertake something of this magnitude for the first time will.
lines.text_raw: I learned this one the hard way. As I bet most people who undertake something of this magnitude for the first time will.

lines.text: First - measure all of the relevant dimensions.
lines.text_raw: First - measure all of the relevant dimensions.

lines.text: Then i'd recommend modeling exactly what you'd like to see in a simple modeling program. I chose sketchup.
lines.text_raw: Then i'd recommend modeling exactly what you'd like to see in a simple modeling program. I chose sketchup.

lines.text: This helps to nail down dimensions you'll be looking at, which can get you to a good idea of the cost and effort required.
lines.text_raw: This helps to nail down dimensions you'll be looking at, which can get you to a good idea of the cost and effort required.

lines.text: Any major feasibility or design issues should become apparent at this point as well.
lines.text_raw: Any major feasibility or design issues should become apparent at this point as well.

lines.text: Step 4 - Readying the walls for Demolition
lines.text_raw: Step 4 - Readying the walls for Demolition

guide.summary: A summary/guide for creating a kitchen pass-through, including overcoming all of the various obstacles you can hope to encounter.
guide.title: Creating a Large Kitchen pass-though
